alert.note: Alert for Jewell (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 24 at 4:25AM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northeastern Jewell, eastern Nuckolls and western Thayer Counties through 500 AM CDT... At 424 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Oak to near Ruskin to near Hardy. Movement was east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Ruskin and Oak around 430 AM CDT. Davenport around 440 AM CDT. Other locations in the path of these storms include Deshler, Byron, Carleton and Hebron. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
